TextView.android:text:
App Name : College Predictor
Contact : mithilesh.prajapati333@gmail.com
Developed by : Mithilesh Prajapati
 Basir Quadri
Students of Government Engineering College of Aurangabad(2015-2019) batch

College predictor app is a solution for all queries of MHT-CET/JEE-mains aspirants regarding admissions in Maharashtra.It is based on the recent trends of students taking admission in these prestigious colleges.

App features:
1) Predict rank on basis of your marks and caste
2) Predict colleges on basis of your rank and caste
3)Efficient college rankings
4)Cut-off for all colleges of Maharashtra for 2016-17.

We welcome your feedbacks and suggestions.


THANK YOU !
